#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;
int arr[1000007];

void solve(){
	int n,count,low,high;
	cin>>n;
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++) cin>>arr[i];
	sort(arr, arr+n);
	low = 0;
	high = n-1;
	count = 1;
	while(low<=high){
		if(count&1){
			cout<<arr[low]<<" ";
			low++;
		}
		else{
			cout<<arr[high]<<" ";
			high--;
		}
		count++;
	}
	cout<<endl;
}
int main(){
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	for(int i=0;i<t;i++) solve();
	return 0;
}
